channel.title: Need help converting into a bluurs client
channel.description: Recently I've made a 317 fullscreen client. and I wanna make it into a bluurs type. if its even possible. I just need to add the bluurs part in etc. its got everything finished i just want it compatible with bluurs so i can use it on my sources etc. if someone could help i would be so glad. thanks =] (also if it works ill send them a copy of the 317 fullscreen client)

item.title: Need help converting into a bluurs client
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

[quote=“chippeh, post:2, topic:330196”]uhm, sir you are smoking pot.
It’s not that simple to just add a file in, you have to edit MOST of the files in the client, plus the cache… o.o[/quote]
one. i am smoking pot :D.
second. i know i just would appreciate some help =\

Read full topic
item.source: Need help converting into a bluurs client
